DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test whether having patients identify a self-management goal (health goal), prior to a visit with their primary care provider, leads to health behavior improvement over six weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Screening Self-management Goals on Short Term Behavior Change
DOC.criteria: Adult patients (>18 years of age) Attending primary care visit at Lowry Family Health Center or Level One Physicians English or SpanishSpeaking Exhibit signs of cognitive impairment or significant hearing impairment Provider recommendation against enrolling in study
